sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Fix sys_kmf_algorithm default aes to AES</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var algoFieldDictionary = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
algoFieldDictionary.addQuery('name', 'sys_kmf_algorithm');
algoFieldDictionary.addQuery('element', 'algorithm');
algoFieldDictionary.addQuery('default_value', 'aes');
algoFieldDictionary.query();
if (algoFieldDictionary.next()) {
	algoFieldDictionary.default_value = 'AES';
	algoFieldDictionary.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-09 23:58:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8bb410535b2030106cdba88ddc81c798</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix sys_kmf_algorithm default aes to AES</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Key Management Framework" source="com.glide.kmf.global">ee533ca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f79</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8bb410535b2030106cdba88ddc81c798</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-10 00:07:14</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Fix sys_kmf_algorithm default aes to AES
